posts.title: Welcome to Xiu's Wiki
posts.text: 这是Xiu的个人 Wiki 站点。 This is Xiu’s personal Wiki site.

posts.title: Add a GitHub Account
posts.path: wiki/便签-Cheat Sheet/GitHub/Add a GitHub account/
posts.text: (1)Command: ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "email" (2)Save in: /c/Users/User/.ssh/FILE_NAME (3)Edit config: Host PROJECT_NAME HostName github.com PreferredAuthentications publickey IdentityFile ~/.ssh/FILE_NAME (4)Add SSH key to GitHub ~/.ssh/FILE_NAME.pub (5)Test SSH connection: ssh -T git@PROJECT_NAME

posts.title: Pip Install from GitHub
posts.path: wiki/便签-Cheat Sheet/Python/Pip install from GitHub/
posts.text: 通过pip3 升级安装 github上的包（可以指定从哪个branch安装）： pip3 install --upgrade https://github.com/soimort/you-get/archive/master.zip
